expectedCss.css: .hover\:prose-lg:hover { color: green; } .hover\:prose-lg:hover :where(p):not(:where([class~='not-prose'], [class~='not-prose'] *)) { color: tomato; } .hover\:prose-lg:hover :where(.hover\:prose-lg:hover > ul > li):not(:where([class~='not-prose'], [class~='not-prose'] *)) { color: blue; } @media (min-width: 640px) { .sm\:prose { color: red; } .sm\:prose :where(p):not(:where([class~='not-prose'], [class~='not-prose'] *)) { color: lime; } .sm\:prose :where(.sm\:prose > ul > li):not(:where([class~='not-prose'], [class~='not-prose'] *)) { color: purple; } } @media (min-width: 1024px) { .lg\:prose-lg { color: green; } .lg\:prose-lg :where(p):not(:where([class~='not-prose'], [class~='not-prose'] *)) { color: tomato; } .lg\:prose-lg :where(.lg\:prose-lg > ul > li):not(:where([class~='not-prose'], [class~='not-prose'] *)) { color: blue; } }
